TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HostAdapterAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class HostAdapterAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class HostAdapterAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 將物件識別為管線的主應用程式端配接器區段。

span.span: Identifies an object as a host-side adapter segment of the pipeline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法，維護的存放區的可用管線區段的相關資訊，請使用這個屬性來識別主機端配接器。The and methods, which maintain the store of information about available pipeline segments, use this attribute to identify a host-side adapter. 這個屬性應該只用於啟動的管線區段的類型。This attribute should be used only on types that activate the segments of the pipeline. 代表主應用程式與增益集之間傳遞物件的類型不需要這個屬性。Types that represent objects passed between the host and the add-in do not need this attribute. ## Examples 下列範例會識別主應用程式端配接器。The following example identifies a host-side adapter. [!code-csharp[AddInP1HostSideAdapters#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddInP1HostSideAdapters/cs/Calc1ContractToViewHostSideAdapter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[AddInP1HostSideAdapters#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddInP1HostSideAdapters/vb/Calc1ContractToViewHostSideAdapter.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
